title: Intractable African Crises Flare as Biden’s Top Diplomat Visits Kenya
content:
1. Intractable African Crises Flare as Biden’s Top Diplomat Visits Kenya  The New York Times
  2. Blinken stresses security, climate in Africa tour  Reuters
  3. Secretary of State Antony Blinken making 1st trip to Africa amid growing crises in Ethiopia, Sudan  ABC News
  4. Crises in Sudan and Ethiopia Worsen as Blinken Begins Africa Visit  The New York Times
  5. On first Africa trip, Blinken confronts questions of U.S. leverage in deepening crises  The Washington Post
